name: Hancy Halka
des: Great worker, I love how he take care of the site plus he replies faster than I, tHANK YOU Top It Ltd DEFINITELY CHOSE AGAIN!!!

name: UI Design Service
des: Extremely prompt with communication & delivery. Very easy to communicate with & fixed any issues needed. Would highly recommend & will return for services when needed. Thank you

name: Sanny Boraki
des: Thank you for your work. Was easy to work with, and the delivery happened fast. The gig was exactly as described, highly recommend.

name: Fanny Ummar
des: Seller worked quickly and professionally, and delivered a solid foundation for a landing page prototype that I ca apply for A/B testing. I recommned especially for people who want to take the visual off their mind and focus on the message.

name: Naneyi Hasi
des: Working with this seller was an incredible experience. This is my first time doing a landing page and he knew exactly what to do to build an interesting and professional page. Thank you

name: Hidar Ibrahim
des: Wow. Wow. Wow. I've worked with MANY company . Top it Ltd here? A gem!! Work with him. Do it now.

name: Jeny
des: Consistent errors throughout delivery. Left a photo of an empty warehouse filled with garbage. Spelling errors etc. Didn't seem like they cared or paid attention to the project.
